Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

Description of a Player object with fields for name, number of wins/losses, and total winnings.

setName

public void setName(java.lang.String newName)
Sets the object's "name" field, validating input to ensure the user only typed characters from a-z If the input is valid, converts it into proper title case for later use. !!!To do this I will need to learn how to include someone else's method: WordUtils.capitalizeFully() http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang/apidocs/org/apache/commons/lang3/text/WordUtils.html#capitalizeFully%28java.lang.String%29

Parameters:
newName - the string to be validated and assign to name
